movies.title: Eroica
movies.plot: Two sketches covering episodes from the World War II. In the first novel, "Scherzo alla polacca", a shrewd son, trying to preserve his skin, ultimately becomes a hero and finds a reason for fighting. He initially tries to avoid underground training to avoid the Warsaw uprising. His drunkenness, disregard for safety and cowardice when sober stated with humorous effect come out as something sane in the world gone mad. His will to survive is more acceptable than any desire for heroic death. The second novel, "Ostinato lugubre", details a hopeless attempt at escape from a prison camp by a man who can no longer stand the confinement and idiocy of the professional soldiers trying to keep up the military preneses in prison. Nevertheless, his escape boosts the morale of his fellow prisoners, while the "escapee" lies hidden from Germans and comrades alike."
movies.simplePlot: Two sketches covering episodes from the World War II. In the first novel, "Scherzo alla polacca", a shrewd son, trying to preserve his skin, ultimately becomes a hero and finds a reason for...

biography.bio: Edward Dziewonski was born on December 16, 1916 in Moscow, Russian Empire. He was an actor and director, known for Eroica (1958), 5 dni z zycia emeryta (1985) and La dernière étape (1948). He died on August 17, 2002 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland.
biography.name: Edward Dziewonski

biography.bio: Barbara Polomska was born on January 9, 1934 in Bydgoszcz, Kujawsko-Pomorskie, Poland. She is an actress, known for Eroica (1958), De la veine à revendre (1960) and The Eighth Day of the Week (1958).
biography.name: Barbara Polomska

biography.bio: Ignacy Machowski was born on July 5, 1920 in Rzeszów, Podkarpackie, Poland. He was an actor, known for First Spaceship on Venus (1960), Ashes and Diamonds (1958) and Eroica (1958). He died on January 11, 2001 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland.
biography.name: Ignacy Machowski

biography.bio: Leon Niemczyk was born on December 15, 1923 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland as Leon Stanislaw Niemczyk. He was an actor, known for Knife in the Water (1962), Train de nuit (1959) and Eroica (1958). He was married to Diana and Doroti. He died on November 29, 2006 in Lódz, Lódzkie, Poland.
biography.name: Leon Niemczyk

biography.placeOfBirth: Prömsel, Galicia, Austria-Hungary [now Przemysl, Podkarpackie, Poland]
biography.bio: Kazimierz Opalinski was born on February 22, 1890 in Prömsel, Galicia, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for Czlowiek na torze (1957), Eroica (1958) and Czarne skrzydla (1963). He died on June 6, 1979 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland.
biography.name: Kazimierz Opalinski

biography.bio: Zofia Czerwinska was born on March 19, 1933 in Poznan, Wielkopolskie, Poland. She is an actress, known for The Pianist (2002), Ashes and Diamonds (1958) and Teddy Bear (1981).
biography.name: Zofia Czerwinska

biography.placeOfBirth: Lódz, Poland, Russian Empire [now Lódz, Lódzkie, Poland]
biography.bio: Eleonora Lorentz was born on October 14, 1906 in Lódz, Poland, Russian Empire [now Lódz, Lódzkie, Poland]. She was an actress, known for Eroica (1958) and Miasteczko (1960). She died on August 3, 1986 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland.
biography.name: Eleonora Lorentz

biography.bio: Emil Karewicz was born on March 13, 1923 in Wilno, Wilenskie, Poland. He is an actor, known for Kanal (1957), Baza ludzi umarlych (1959) and L'ombre (1956). He was previously married to Teresa.
biography.name: Emil Karewicz

biography.bio: Tomasz Lengren was born on March 7, 1945 in Lublin, Lubelskie, Poland. He was an actor and director, known for Klincz (1979), L'interrogatoire (1982) and Eroica (1958). He died on July 9, 2008 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland.
biography.name: Tomasz Lengren

biography.bio: Jerzy Turek was born on January 17, 1934 in Tchórzowa, Mazowieckie, Poland. He was an actor, known for Krzyz Walecznych (1959), Calls Controlled (1991) and Eroica (1958). He died on February 14, 2010 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie.
biography.name: Jerzy Turek

biography.bio: Roman Wilhelmi was born on June 6, 1936 in Poznan, Wielkopolskie, Poland. He was an actor, known for The War of the Worlds: Next Century (1981), Cma (1980) and Hotel Pacific (1975). He died on November 3, 1991 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland.
biography.name: Roman Wilhelmi

biography.bio: Tomasz Zaliwski was born on December 15, 1929 in Rudzieniec, Lubelskie, Poland. He was an actor, known for How I Unleashed World War II (1970), Eroica (1958) and Dluznicy smierci (1986). He was married to Teresa Lipowska. He died on July 13, 2006 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland.
biography.name: Tomasz Zaliwski

biography.bio: Jerzy Felczynski was born on July 4, 1927 in Kalusz, Stanislawowskie, Poland. He was an actor, known for Eroica (1958), Zaczarowany rower (1955) and Chopin. Pragnienie milosci (2002). He died on March 11, 2014 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland.
biography.name: Jerzy Felczynski

biography.placeOfBirth: Kopyczynce, Poland, Russian Empire [now Kopychyntsi, Ternopil Oblast, Ukraine]
biography.bio: Roman Hubczenko was born on March 23, 1878 in Kopyczynce, Poland, Russian Empire. He was an actor, known for Eroica (1958), Baza ludzi umarlych (1959) and The Eighth Day of the Week (1958). He died on December 16, 1958 in Opole, Opolskie, Poland.
biography.name: Roman Hubczenko

biography.bio: Zygmunt Listkiewicz was born on March 17, 1932 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland. He was an actor, known for Czlowiek na torze (1957), Eroica (1958) and Trzy opowiesci (1953). He died on May 10, 1989 in Warsaw.
biography.name: Zygmunt Listkiewicz
